home.title: Hi, I'm
home.description: I create modern, high-performance web applications,
home.description2: combining backend and frontend for seamless user experiences.

about.title: About
about.description: Full-stack developer with a particular affinity for back-end development..
about.description2: I design robust and scalable technical solutions, combining back-end expertise (Node.js, databases) with mastery of modern front-end frameworks.
about.description3: My approach focuses on performance, maintainability, and user experience, with an ability to adapt quickly to business needs.
about.description4: I am looking for ambitious technical challenges to put my skills to work on innovative projects.
